statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE restock_threshold < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > restock_threshold ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND current_stock > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, restock_threshold FROM inventory WHERE restock_threshold BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, restock_threshold FROM InventoryItems ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE restock_threshold <= 5 AND employee_id = 100;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RestockOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, restock_threshold FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_name LIKE '%Chair%' AND quantity < restock_threshold ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT employee_id, item_id, item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems INNER JOIN RestockOrders ON InventoryItems.item_id = RestockOrders.item_id WHERE RestockOrders.quantity > 20 ORDER BY InventoryItems.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryItems WHERE restock_threshold - quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLocation;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM InventoryLocation WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM RestockHistory ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, restock_quantity FROM Product LEFT JOIN RestockHistory ON Product.product_id = RestockHistory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLocation WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address, capacity FROM InventoryLocation WHERE location_name LIKE 'Storage%' AND capacity >= 200 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT restock_id, restock_quantity, restock_date FROM RestockHistory WHERE restock_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY restock_date DESC;

SELECT location_id, location_name, location_address, capacity, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Product WHERE Product.product_id = RestockHistory.product_id) AS total_products FROM InventoryLocation LEFT JOIN RestockHistory ON InventoryLocation.location_id = Product.location_id ORDER BY total_products DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_products;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_products WHERE current_quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_quantity, order_date FROM restock_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, restock_quantity, restock_date FROM inventory_products INNER JOIN restock_history ON inventory_products.id = restock_history.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_products WHERE current_quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT * FROM restock_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Product ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, address, manager_name FROM Location;
SELECT restock_quantity, restock_date FROM StockHistory WHERE restock_quantity > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_restock_date FROM Product WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_restock_date FROM Product WHERE last_restock_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, location_name, restock_date FROM Product p INNER JOIN Location l ON p.product_id = l.location_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Supplier;
